h1. Account Details

{{html:
  <tabset style="clear:both;">
      <tab id="credit" heading="Credit">
        <div id="credit" class="tab-pane active">
}}
          {{include:Billing}}
{{html:
        </div>
      </tab>
      <tab id="account" heading="Account" ng-controller="AccountController">
      <form name="form" ng-submit="updatePassword()">
        <div class="tab-pane row" style="margin-bottom: 40px; margin-left: 15px;">
          <div style="margin-bottom: 20px;" ng-switch="preferredDataLocation" ng-show="preferredDataLocation">
            <label class="left control-group" style="margin: 0 10px 0 0; width: 150px; height: 30px; line-height: 30px; font-size: 14px;">Preferred Location:</label>
            <img src="/$$space/.files/img/flags/canada.png" title="Canada" ng-switch-when="CA1">
            <img src="/$$space/.files/img/flags/usa.png" title="United States" ng-switch-when="US1">
          </div>
          <div class="nameField" style="margin-bottom: 10px;">
             <label class="left control-group" style="margin: 0 10px 0 0; width: 150px; height: 30px; line-height: 30px; font-size: 14px;">Current Password:</label>
            <input required ng-model="oldPassword" type="password" class="input-xxlarge" style="width: 30%; float: left; margin-right: 10px;">
            <span style="color: rgb(160, 14, 14); font-size: 13px;">{[ currentPasswordMessage ]}</span>
          </div>
          <div class="nameField" style="margin-bottom: 10px;">
             <label class="left control-group" style="margin: 0 10px 0 0; width: 150px; height: 30px; line-height: 30px; font-size: 14px;">New Password:</label>
            <input required ng-model="newPassword" type="password" class="input-xxlarge" style="width: 30%; float: left; margin-right: 10px;">
            <span style="color: rgb(160, 14, 14); font-size: 13px;">{[ newPasswordMessage ]}</span>
          </div>
          <div class="nameField" style="margin-bottom: 10px;">
             <label class="left control-group" style="margin: 0 10px 0 0; width: 150px; height: 30px; line-height: 30px; font-size: 14px;">Retype Password:</label>
            <input required ng-model="retypePassword" type="password" class="input-xxlarge" style="width: 30%; float: left;">
          </div>
        </div>
          <button type="submit" class="btn btn-info btn-large">Update Password</button>
          <div style="text-align: center;">
            <div class="alert alert-success" ng-show="updateResultMessage" style="margin-top: 20px !important; width: 40%; text-align: center;">{[ updateResultMessage ]}</div>
          </div>
        </form>
      </tab>
      <!-- <tab id="access" heading="Access">
        <div id="access" class="tab-pane"> -->
          <!-- {{include:AccountAccessManagement}} -->
}}
